tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Pratima Verma  is a friendly and approachable doctor making each visit a pleasant experience. Her treatment methods are effective and through, always ensuring that her patient always receive the best possible care.  I recall a time when I was particularly anxious about my symptoms, and doctor took the time to explain everything in detail,easing my worries and providing a clear treatment plan.  Her commitment to patient-well being is truly commendable and  I am grateful to have a doctor like her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very positive and caring. Patiently listens to the problems and accordingly  suggest the medications

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Pratima Verma listened to my problem in detail and I am fully satisfied with the medical diagnosis. I would definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Verma isn’t just our family doctor, she is now like family. She is the most kind and caring and empathetic doctor. She truly cares about the wellbeing of her patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Verma for help with a stomach infection. Very polite….very patiently listened to me and diagnosed my problem….started me on medication. The reception and nursing staff at the clinic were also very helpful. Highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor Pratima was very homely and gave the best treatment. She went over and above to understand the problem to comfort the patient. She also kept checking on my mother over text messages regarding her health.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Pratima Verma helped me manager my diabetes. Grateful for her guidance. I highly recommend her diabetes education session for anyone suffering from diabetes

tags: None
review: *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **.  She is an allrounder and diagnosed in detail and suggested remedies.  I suffer from multiple health issues, including obesity, sleep apnea, urinary infection, and deficiency in vital vitamins.  It is just been 10 days since my appointment and with the medicines she has prescribed,  I am already feeling better.  I strongly recommend consulting Dr. Pratima Verma for any health issues.

tags: None
review: Dr Pratima Verma is an excellent physician. All my family members used to visit her when we were in India. She diagnoses root cause of the disease faster with minimum possible investigations and cure it in timely manner. After moving abroad, we continue taking her online consultation as and when needed. She is an amazing doctor and moreover good human being. One must visit her for the appropriate medical advice and treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: she is a perfectionist as a doctor. The medicine prescribed by her works very well for my whole family i.e. child to old aged. On the basis of her expert advice, we go further for any major treatment if required in my family.
